Package io.sphere.sdk.discountcodes.commands.updateactions

Provides the possible operations which can be performed on update commands for discount codes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChangeCartDiscounts
    Changes the cart discounts.
    ChangeGroups
    Updates the groups property of a DiscountCode.
    SetCartPredicate
    Sets the cart predicate.
    SetCustomField
    Updates a custom field.
    SetCustomType
    Sets/unsets the custom type.
    SetDescription
    Sets the description.
    SetMaxApplications
    Sets the maximum applicable number of a discount code.
    SetMaxApplicationsPerCustomer
    Sets the maximum number of applicable discount codes per customer.
    SetName
    Sets the name of the discount code.
    SetValidFrom
    Updates the validFrom property of a DiscountCode.
    SetValidFromAndUntil
    Updates the validFrom property of a DiscountCode.
    SetValidUntil
    Updates the validUntil property of a DiscountCode.

Package io.sphere.sdk.discountcodes.commands.updateactions Description

Provides the possible operations which can be performed on update commands for discount codes.
